triples.name: Bifurcation theory
triples.relevance: The paper analyzes parametric bifurcation in evolutionary game systems on lattices.

triples.name: Symbolic dynamics
triples.relevance: Symbolic dynamics is explicitly examined in the paper to study chaotic behavior of evolutionary games.

triples.name: Evolution strategy
triples.relevance: The paper investigates evolutionary strategies as the main subject of study on one-dimensional lattices.

triples.name: Topological conjugacy
triples.relevance: Topological conjugacy is used to classify 14 conjugacy classes of evolutionary game systems.

triples.name: Topological entropy
triples.relevance: The paper derives nonzero topological entropy as a chaotic characteristic of the investigated systems.

triples.name: Mixing (mathematics)
triples.relevance: The paper derives mixing property as a chaotic characteristic of evolutionary game systems.

triples.name: Chicken (game)
triples.relevance: Snowdrift game is analyzed in the context of symbolic dynamics, where snowdrift is a variant of chicken game.

triples.name: Evolutionary game theory
triples.relevance: Evolutionary game dynamical systems on lattices form the central focus of the paper's analysis.

triples.name: Dimensionality reduction
triples.relevance: An effective dimensionality reduction method is proposed to classify payoff matrix parameters.
